member.name: T:SignNow.Net.Interfaces.IFolderService
member.summary: Interface for any operations with a folders in SignNow
member.remarks:
Folders serve for storing user's documents.
By default, there are three folders in every account:
Documents
Templates
Archive
Subfolders can be created only for these three and their child folders.

member.name: T:SignNow.Net.Interfaces.ISignNowContext
member.summary:
Interface that manages other SignNow interfaces: IDocumentService, IUserService, ISignInvite, IFolderService.
It contains:
interface for any operations with a Document in SignNow; can be used to create, download, retrieve, delete a document etc.
interface for any operations with a User in SignNow; i.e. create a user, authenticate a user, retrieve user's documents etc.
interface for any operations with an Invite in SignNow: creating or canceling the invite to sign a document, checking status of the invite, etc.
interface for any operations with a Folders in SignNow: can be used to create, view, rename or delete a folders.
